name: Crumple Crown
description:
## Crumple Crown

Crown yourself with the illustrious Crumple Crown, an exclusive wearable that exudes elegance and refinement.

### Bumpkins.io

Deposit this wearable in Sunflower Land to equip it on your Bumpkin

### About

Bumpkins is a community driven customisable NFT project powered by Sunflower Land
